description.narrative:
Sverige kommer att stödja AJMTEM, en civil organisation från Moldavien, för genomförandet av kärnstödsaktiviteter försedda av AJMTEM Strategiska plan och RAF under 2020 – 2023. Kärnstöd beviljas för att stärka den institutionella kapaciteten och för att stödja genomförandet av AJMTEM medellång sikt Strategisk plan 2020—2023. Huvudmålet och det förväntade resultatet av kärnverksamheten är att AJMTEM bidrar till att utveckla journalisternas kapacitet att återspegla miljöfrågor.
Under den förberedande processen för insatsen, så har Sida’s principer och centrala prioriteringar för samarbetet med civilsamhällesorganisationer diskuterats med partnern. AJMTEM ställer sig bakom Sidas gemensamma utgångspunkter för samarbete. Ambassaden tillsammans med AJMTEM kommer att ha en kontinuerlig, öppen och transparent dialog om etiska och andra värdebaserade frågor.

Sweden will support AJMTEM, a civil society organisation from Moldova, to implement core support activities provided by AJMTEM Strategic Plan and RAF during 2020 - 2023.
Core support is granted to strengthen institutional capacities and to assist the implementation of AJMTEM medium term Strategic Plan 2020-2023. The main objective and expected result of core activities is that AJMTEM contributes to developing the capacities of journalists in reflecting environmental issues.
Principal values for Sida and cooperation partners were shared and discussed as guidance during initial consultations on the contribution/project between programme coordinator and organization. AJMTEM is open to endorse Sida's common starting points for cooperation. The Embassy, together with AJMTEM will have a continuous, open and transparent dialogue on ethical and other value based issues.

The main objective of the Core support to AJMTEM is the institutional development of the association and the shift from project-based towards a mission-driven orgaization. In this way, the within the core support, AJMTEM will implement its strategy for the period 2020-2023 and the coresponding Results Assessment Framework. The major outcomes that AJMTEM is working towards are: - Consolidation of environmental journalism;- Increased environmental awareness of population achieved through an adequate environmental information;- A well developed and sustainable organization; During the implementation period it is expected a number of active journalists to regularly publish informative, analytical and investigative materials on environment and climate related topics, in a well informed and objective manner. It is expected, this to contribute to a better understanding of environmental issues by the public and its active participation in environmental decision making.
